title: Ranked
body: Why i canÂ´t play Ranked Games ?

replies.body:
~~It looks like you're level 30, so the only other restriction would be having enough champions unlocked in your pool.  You'll want at least 20 champs including those part of the free rotation.  I hope that helps!~~

Scratch that, EU is having login issues right now so ranked may be down as a precaution.
hey, but i have the same problem since two month. Any solution?

Porocles,

The Ranked queue's are gone from the euw client they aren't between the play options anymore

Aha!  I just checked the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, and it looks like EU is having login issues right now.  Ranked is likely disabled as a result so players with the issue aren't penalized.
